analysis: The project is a static website focused on black holes, with existing HTML, CSS, and JavaScript files. The theme should be cosmic and dark, with animations related to black holes. The current files need to be updated to reflect a cohesive black hole theme with animated elements and interactive features.

improvements.description: Update the CSS to include a dark, cosmic theme with animations for black hole visuals, swirling effects, and glowing elements. Use colors like deep purple, black, and dark blue to create a space-like atmosphere.

Complete the HTML content to ensure all sections are properly included, such as the main content area with interactive planets, animated slides, and other sections related to black holes. Add a mobile-friendly navigation menu with a hamburger icon for better usability on mobile devices.

Fix the syntax errors in the showSlide function and complete the JavaScript content to ensure all functions are properly implemented. Add event listeners and functionality for the new buttons added in test-website/index.html to ensure smooth transitions and user-friendly interactions.
